Galix enters with four counters of your choice from among flying, lifelink, deathtouch, and +1/+1. You may choose the same type of counter multiple times.
Retrofit–{1}{B}, Sacrifice an artifact and a creature. [i](You may cast this from the battlefield for its retrofit cost. It’s a 4/4 artifact creature and loses retrofit.)[/i]
You may retrofit Galix from your graveyard.
